@SocietyNews. Possibly not ....I am just hearing that from you!!
Here we go, to continue battling! And to continue winning! A hug of a thousand hearts to my beloved People, to my HeroicPueblo! We will live and we will come!
Happy Easter Sunday to everyone who celebrates Easter!

Live all of our big gathering today at #Vincennes live on my campaign site! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012
Happy Easter to Orthodox Christians and all Lebanese -MS
Christ has risen ... truly risen. We hope for the resurrection and prosperity of Lebanon
RT @Annahar: President Suleiman Arrived in Australia @SleimanMichel #Lebanon #Annahar #Australia
More than 100,000 people gather at #Vincennes for our big gathering! An event to follow live on http://t.co/EaXM2v7g
I hear the clamor, I measure the fervor, I imagine tomorrow the happiness that could be ours if we reach the victory! #Vincennes
The moment is approaching, the French will determine their destiny. #Vincennes
It is an exceptional choice, in an exceptional moment, to designate who will lead France. #Vincennes # FH2012
I want to tell you my confidence, I feel a great hope, a hope of the depths of our country! #Vincennes # FH2012
A calm, firm, lucid hope, the hope of a start, the hope of justice, the hope of the youth of France! #Vincennes
Calling speculation for help to prevent alternation It will not succeed because it is the French people, free and sovereign who decides!
To call for fear is already to retreat! #Vincennes # FH2012
I reject this pernicious way of setting half of France against the other. #Vincennes # FH2012
There is not on one side a noisy minority and on the other a silent majority! #Vincennes # FH2012
This majority will not be silent, it will be bold, it will be great, the great majority of the change! #Vincennes # FH2012
I said it and I repeat it in front of you: I'm ready, ready to represent you in the 2nd round, ready to win May 6th and ready to preside over France!
My compatriots, it is necessary to come to vote, to vote for yourself, to vote for the Republic, to vote for France. #Vincennes # FH2012
I call you to give a harsh judgment on the quinquennium that is coming to an end! #Vincennes # FH2012
The challenge of this election is France and first the youth, who must regain confidence in her, find her place in the Republic!
No child of the Republic will be forgotten, abandoned, abandoned. This is the commitment I take before you! #Vincennes # FH2012
It is a general mobilization that will have to be decreed, as in other periods of our History! #Vincennes # FH2012
France is not bankrupt, even if it is its leaders who have failed! #Vincennes # FH2012
The hospital will again be considered a public service and not a business! #Vincennes # FH2012
If I am tomorrow the President, there will be a renegotiation of the treaty. Austerity will not be the only rule! #Europe #Vincennes # FH2012
@Kyaruzi @YerickoNyerere @MariaSTsehai @MikieMcKee Si sahihi kuuliza uhalali wa utoaji rambirambi katika msiba. Utoaji ni moyo na si kiwango
France will always be present where it is a question of fighting for democracy! #Vincennes # FH2012
The greatness of History will be to prolong together the march towards progress, towards conquests, towards pride! #Vincennes # FH2012
I am ready to preside over France! #Vincennes # FH2012
I will be the president of a Republic that will be stronger than the markets, a France that will be more powerful than finance! #Vincennes
I will be the president of the coherence with a course that I will hold: recovery and redistribution! #Vincennes # FH2012
I will be the President of justice: before any decision, I will ask myself one question: is it fair? #Vincennes # FH2012
To be President of the Republic is to reunite the nation around a cause. This cause, I called it the French Dream! #Vincennes # FH2012
Today, I'm not asking you to help me, I'm asking you to help France! #Vincennes # FH2012
A vote is a vote. What matters is not being the richest, nor the powerful, what matters is to be the most numerous! #Vincennes
We waited too long: 10 years in the opposition! We have the duty of victory! #Vincennes # FH2012
Give me, on April 22, the strength to lead you to victory on May 6! #Vincennes # FH2012
The victory is next Sunday, with you all! #Vincennes # FH2012

@LannersPub ..need to take full responsibility&act responsibly ourselves as collaboration happens with others!!
@LannersPub. Up to you to look around and find out who uses it..the consequences will show ...!

The VI Summit of the Americas in Colombia ends, in which we move forward to achieve more development and reduce inequality and poverty.
We also work to strengthen the regional fight against drug trafficking, a cruel and ruthless enemy of the freedom of the people.
At the same time, we must improve the prevention and rehabilitation of young people who are the main victims of drug traffickers.

Follow live now our gathering at #Carmaux: http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012
I measure the responsibility you entrusted to me! #Carmaux # FH2012
More than 31 years ago, François Mitterrand came here to launch his presidential campaign! #Carmaux # FH2012
In 2007, Nicolas Sarkozy, Toulouse, then candidate, had cited 32 times the name of Jean Jaurès! So that was his reference! #Carmaux # 2012
Today, did he once mention Jean Jaurès? He can not! #Carmaux # FH2012
The challenges of the world described by Jaurès are still ours: peace, education, secularism, social rights. #Carmaux # FH2012
Today I claim the synthesis of Jaurès, between the ideal that we must serve and the reality that is before us! #Carmaux # FH2012
Consistency requires making commitments in a campaign. I did it last January! http://t.co/qmoXwGKD #Carmaux # FH2012
Viva BarrioAdentro! This is the Vanguard Mission. From here, following my treatment, I congratulate and celebrate the 9 years of BarrioAdentro!
The priority of my quinquennium will be the youth through the National Education, the fight against school failure, training! #Carmaux
I have indicated the first steps that I will have to take: http://t.co/zuUShNgL #Carmaux # FH2012
Greetings to all and all there in Petare-Saint Lucia! Honor to Cuba! Honor to Venezuela! This is only possible in Socialism! ElReinoDeDiosAquí!
We will not waste time. I did not hide anything, nothing hidden! #Camaux # FH2012
I have the feeling, by dint of moving, that a confidence is being born! #Carmaux # FH2012
I want that around my candidacy, there is a hope of a better future. #Carmaux # FH2012
I am a normal candidate to be a normal President! #Carmaux # FH2012
We will not change France if only the State decides! #Carmaux # FH2012
An omnipresident is a helpless President, we know it today! #Carmaux # FH2012
I feel this hope that asserts itself, the hope of change! #Carmaux # FH2012
What threatens us is first and foremost abstention. An abstention not of indifference but of rupture. #Carmaux # FH2012
The temptation of the far right threatens us too. #Carmaux # FH2012
My message is simple: those who want change must vote for change in the first round! #Carmaux # FH2012
I do not claim a useful vote, but the winning vote, the vote of victory! #Carmaux # FH2012
The last threat to us is that which the incumbent has brandished: fear. #Carmaux # FH2012
We will treat them with dignity, we Spaniards will treat them as friends. #Carmaux # FH2012
It is because I do not want the Europe of austerity that I will renegotiate the European treaty. #Carmaux # FH2012
I wanted to mark this campaign with the seal of constancy. I did not change my project based on moods and moods. #Carmaux
I refuse the division of France. There is only France, there is only one country. #Carmaux # FH2012
The role of a President is not to divide but to unite, to gather, to reconcile France! #Carmaux # FH2012
I am here in the mission that is mine: to do once again, the left meets France! #Carmaux # FH2012
Thank you for inviting me here to #Carmaux, for having welcomed me, thank you for taking cold to have warmer tomorrow! # FH2012
I thank @DamidotValerie for his support! http://t.co/Ak5TWSCJ # FH2012
Very good Aristobulus! Good for the PSUV!
Pa'lante my Socialist Party! Towards the Battle of Carabobo!
